summary: Bio-engineering milestones, Korean political upheaval, and the opening of Expo 2025 in Osaka.

events.details: SpaceX launches first crewed polar retrograde orbit mission.
South Korea's Constitutional Court removes President Yoon Suk Yeol from office.
Colossal Biosciences announces birth of engineered Dire Wolf pups Romulus, Remus, and Khaleesi.
Fire and stampede at a Santo Domingo club kill nearly 100.
Launch of a universal AI agent builder for live security camera monitoring.
World Expo begins in Osaka, Japan, focusing on 'Designing Future Society for Our Lives'.
JWST team reports possible organic molecules in exoplanet K2-18b's atmosphere.
Border clashes kill dozens and displace thousands along the frontier.
